data.eml:eml: Six new species of the genus Balta Tepper (Blattaria, Pseudophyllodrominae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Che, Yanli, Chen, Li, Wang, Zongqing (2010): Six new species of the genus Balta Tepper (Blattaria, Pseudophyllodrominae) from China. Zootaxa 2609: 55-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197769
